tweet: Ever wondered how much #IOTA will improve once we upgraded our entire stack (node, libraries and wallet software)? Here’s a preview of the performance increases with the upcoming #Chrysalis upgrade.

#IOTA Chrysalis has big changes in many aspects. For IoT ecosystem, the new address scheme is 100 times faster than the previous version on #ESP32, plus it's easy to integrate into hardware wallet devices. port iota.c on #STM32 is WIP.  https://t.co/CwWHhTV8zQ  https://t.co/t0iDw6HDnU

Couldn’t make last week’s #IOTATalks (or want to watch it all over again)? @domschiener talked about some of the key elements of #Firefly, the migration to #Chrysalis and shared our vision to make #IOTA production-ready in 2021.  https://t.co/Er4hF0wiQy

"Fake Covid-19 test certificates sold by criminals, Europol says" not with @Ubirch_Trust and verified Covid-19 test results via feeless #DLT technologies @iotatoken "Frankfurt Airport is using #IOTA to verify COVID-19 test results"  https://t.co/bfLlWZGd4W  https://t.co/kHfcONbFaD
